product.description: A smarter alternative to Onelink.to, specifically designed for growth marketers to track the performance of their distribution channels, including clicks, downloads, and onboarding.

features.name: Performance Tracking
features.description: Enables tracking of top-performing distribution channels down to every click, download, and onboarding action.

product.targeted_market: Growth marketers looking for a more advanced solution to monitor and optimize their marketing channel effectiveness.
product.problem_product_is_solving: Lack of granular insight into the performance of marketing distribution channels, making it difficult to identify which channels are driving the most valuable user actions like clicks, downloads, and onboarding.
